title.narrative: Systems Strengthening for Better HIV/TB Patient Outcomes (Kheth'Impilo)

description.narrative: The goal of this project is to improve patient outcomes through health systems strengthening in line with the NSP, PHC and NHI strategies. The 4 objectives have cross linkages with the GoSAs 10 Point Plan for overhauling the health system to achieve zero transmission, initiation of 80% of eligible patients, retention of 70% in care at 5 years, and reducing new TB infections and deaths by 50%.

usg:treasury-account.usg:main-account: HIV/AIDS Working Capital Fund, International Development
